properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ProcessCommandLine contains ".vbs -register " and ((FolderPath endswith "\\cscript.exe" or FolderPath endswith "\\wscript.exe") or (ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName in~ ("cscript.exe", "wscript.exe")))

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects potential abuse of the "register_app.vbs" script that is part of the Windows SDK. The script offers the capability to register new VSS/VDS Provider as a COM+ application. Attackers can use this to install malicious DLLs for persiste
